text: hajja ane umarahane allaha ta'ala mate pura karo, ham jo tamane roki levamam ave to je kurabanini sahulata hoya tene kari nakho ane potana mathana vala na kapavo jyam sudhi ke kurabani kurabanini jagya'e na pahonci jaya, ham tamara manthi je bimara hoya athava tena mathamam ko'i takalipha hoya (jena karane mathana vala kapavi le) tena para muktidanda che, icche to rojho rakhi le athava to dana kari de athava to kurabani kari de, basa jyare tame santini sthitimam avi java to je vyakti umarahathi la'i hajja sudhi tamattu'a (hajjano eka prakara) kare, basa! Tene je kurabanini sahulata hoya tene kari de, jene sakti na hoya te trana rojha hajjana divasomam rakhi le ane sata rojha pacha pharati vakhate, a pura dasa tha'i rojha tha'i gaya, a adesa te loko mate che je masjide haramana rahevasi na hoya, loko! Allahathi darata raho ane jani lo ke allaha ta'ala sakhata yatana apanara che
